hints.content:
Every coin has a different value.

Coin name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
Penny | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/d0799f515398b1f48cb0baa7bdc8d0c12e26c70c.png) | $1¢$
Nickel | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f6c7ae82228012be92b624995809aeabc8e95370.png) | $5¢$
Dime | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/2017369b968caa0c88d046bddf2406665c8cd34d.png) | $10¢$
Quarter | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/1cc5cb6f4c779c49984f5a63a58443ce0ca96ff9.png) | $25¢$

First, let's find how much money Cam found in his couch.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f1806c83114672f6fd277212b6f3779860f76eae.png)

$\underbrace{\goldE{5¢} +\goldE{5¢} + \goldE{5¢}}_{\goldE{3}{\text{ nickels}}} 
 + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢} + \maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{2}{\text{ pennies}}}= 17¢$

Cam found $17¢$ in his couch.

Now, let's add the amount of money Cam found under the rug.

$\underbrace{17¢}_{{\text{couch coins}}} +\underbrace{\blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢}}_{\blueE{2}{\text{ quarters}}} + \underbrace{\purpleD{10¢} + \purpleD{10¢} + \purpleD{10¢}}_{\purpleD{3}{\text{ dimes}}} +  \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ penny}}} = 98¢$

Cam found $98¢$ while cleaning his living room.

question.content:
Cam was cleaning his living room. He found the following coins tucked in the couch cushions:

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f1806c83114672f6fd277212b6f3779860f76eae.png)

Then, he found $2$ quarters, $3$ dimes, and $1$ penny under the rug.

**How much money did Cam find in all?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
